text: Nakia Burrise is an American actress known for her role as Tanya Sloan, the Yellow Zeo Ranger and later, the first Yellow Turbo Ranger on the television series Power Rangers Zeo and Power Rangers Turbo from 1996 to 1997. Burrise was born in San Diego, California, the daughter of Deborah and Cornell Burrise. She attended Thomas Alva Edison Senior High School in Stockton, California (1989–1992) and UCLA's School of Theater. In 2017, she was cast in the short film The Order and had cast many Power Rangers alumni.The Order film 2017 on henshinjustice.com The Order film 2017 on nerdbastards.comThe Order movie science fiction.com ==Filmography== ===Film=== * Under Wraps (1997) (TV) ....
